3.heading: Peláez, Ricardo, 1968-
3.title: "La Onomatoepopeya : 7o Encuentro Internacional de Historietistas"
3.author: Ricardo Peláez
3.appears_in: p. 68-74 in Revista Latinoamericana de Estudios sobre la Historieta, v. 2, no. 6 (Junio 2002).
notes: Resumen: "El Taller de Perro resultó un tránsito desde Gallito Comics para los jóvenes artistas que proponían otra alternative de lectura del cómic y que halló un eco favorable en un reducido grupo de lectores, fiel exigente. Hay aquí un ejemplo posible de imitar y obtener resultados en otras fronteras."

Summary: The Taller del Perro is a development from Gallito Comics by a group of young artists who wanted a comics reading alternative, and who found their small group of faithful readers. Here we have an example that can possibly be imitated with good results elsewhere.
Abstracts as printed with the article, with some editing of the English.

notes: Begins: "Release my woman, David Innes, before"

277.title: Pellucidar

notes: Begins: "I hate to just leave you here, Abner"

278.title: Pellucidar

notes: Begins: "Abner! Abner Perry! Where are you"
